title: Verify: Expand Frontend Test Coverage to 70%
description:
Run automated tests for task T-032.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Write unit, integration, and E2E tests (Vitest, React Testing Library, Playwright) for all components, state, and flows to reach 70%+ coverage.
Criteria:
- Frontend test coverage >= 70%
- All tests pass
- Coverage report generated
